item.description:
We need about 40 extra volunteers

throughout each day

Thursday & Friday Dec. 22 & 23 8am. to 4 pm.

Nashua Soup Kitchen & Shelter Inc.
42 Chestnut Street, PO Box 3116
Nashua, NH   03061-3116
Telephone 603-889-7770  Ext 21
Fax 603-889-2347

Nashua Soup Kitchen wrote:

There are a number of ways you can help:
                Your Generosity of Time and Caring
                Donations: Cash and In Kind, Volunteer

Hello Friends, I know everyone is busy during the holiday season, especially this close to Christmas, but this is for a great cause. Please see the attached note from the Community Outreach person at the Nashua Soup Kitchen.
If you are interested, and would like to go help as a group, I am trying to organize a day and time that works for most people. Reply back with a day and timeframe that is good for you or feel free to setup your own group to go there! Please pass on the word as well!

“If you (or know any friends or family) have any time Thursday or Friday to volunteer, we are packing and distributing about 800 Holiday Food boxes and need volunteers anytime between 8AM – 4PM.  We need about 40 extra volunteers throughout each day to make the event a successful one!  Thanks again, Derek!”
 Carol Weeks
Community Outreach
 
The Nashua Soup Kitchen & Shelter (NSK&S) is dedicated to providing shelter and food to those in need. The overall objective of the agency is to advocate, create, and operate programs and services that promote dignity and self-sufficiency for those we serve.
 
I Wish a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year to You and your family.
item.name: Volunteer Help Needed Today &
